column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Why go elsewhere? This place is always busy
column2: so be sure you have reservations because it's always full. A little tricky to get to
column3: but a worthy trek. The steaks are always of the highest quality and are always cooked perfectly. Name a cut and I have tried it. I love their corn side dish. Although the sides are a bit pricey
column4: you get your money's worth. The drinks are tasty and nice strong and the service is great. Get the bone-in ribeye. You're welcome.
